PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2022-04542022-04-29,  ,  PSPC,  , 
ActNational Capital Act
SubjectOrder Authorizing the National Capital Commission to Grant an Easement to Canada Lands Company ***NCC***
PrecisOrder authorizing the National Capital Commission to GRANT AN EASEMENT for a period of 99 years to CANADA LANDS COMPANY over the real property located in Wateridge Village, in Ottawa, Ontario, for the purpose of building, maintaining and accessing a storm water management facility and associated infrastructure.
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Order Authorizing the National Capital Commission to Grant an Easement to Canada Lands Company ***NCC***
precis: Order authorizing the National Capital Commission to GRANT AN EASEMENT for a period of 99 years to CANADA LANDS COMPANY over the real property located in Wateridge Village, in Ottawa, Ontario, for the purpose of building, maintaining and accessing a storm water management facility and associated infrastructure.
